name: Lonza AG
goal: Lonza is a global leader in the production and support of active pharmaceutical ingredients, both chemically and biotechnologically, as well as in microbial control. Headquartered in Basel, Switzerland, Lonza has more than 40 major manufacturing and R&D facilities and approximately 9,800 full-time employees worldwide. In the EU, Lonza has major sites in the United Kingdom, Spain, Belgium and the Czech Republic.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: We follow EU initiatives, policies and legislation in the field of health, pharmaceutical, bioresearch, food protection, the water framework and chemical management legislation. The specific legislative pieces we are interested in is the REACH regulation, CLP, Biocidal Products Regulation, Cosmetics regulation, MRL legislation and their processes, as well as the Circular Economy.
